resources.string: Come up with something for everyone to draw and choose its category. At the end of this phase, one word will be chosen at random.

Vel nihil iure saepe voluptas. Non consequatur reiciendis sunt quod sapiente architecto cumque vel. Assumenda veniam impedit qui deleniti totam quia. Aut ut consequuntur dignissimos. Officiis quia amet voluptatem amet illo.
Tap the card below to reveal what you\'re supposed to draw. If there\'s an X instead of a word, you\'re the Fake Artist!
10% chance everyone is a Fake Artist. The player with the most votes wins!
10% chance there\'s a random amount of Fake Artists. In this mode, there\'s always more artists than Fake Artists. If a Fake Artist is voted, the whole FA team loses.
There\'s only a slim chance that the Fake Artist is first.
A Fake Artist Goes To New York Logo
